subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which prominent battlefield of Rajasthan is associated with the Mahabharata?
question_hi: राजस्थान में महाभारत से संबंधित अलग-अलग बैलेंटफील्ड क्या है।
explanation_en: Rajasthan is known for its rich history, including the Mahabharata-related battlefield of Jaipur. The other options mentioned, Ajmer, Kishangarh, and Ranthambore, are also significant sites but the answer is Jaipur as it is prominently associated with the Mahabharata.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान महाभारत के विशेष संगमें में एक अवस्थान का महाभारत के मौती के अनुसार, जैपुर है। आमें सीधी संगमें एक अवस्थान का महाभारत के मौती के संगमें, जहां जात है।
explanation_en: Considering the association of Mahabharata, Jaipur is the prominent battlefield. Along with Jaipur, other significant battlefields in Rajasthan include Ajmer and Kishangarh.
explanation_hi: महाभारत के अवस्थान के संगमें, जैपूर है। आमें किशंगाँगमें एक अवस्थान के संगमें, जैपूर और किशंगाँगमें, जहां जाती है।
question_en: Which city served as the capital of Rajasthan before Jodhpur?
question_hi: जो राजस्थान के पहले जोधुपूर की राजशाख है ?

subject: Rajasthan History

explanation_en: Jodhpur, known as Chittorgarh, is a historical city that played a crucial role in Rajasthan's history. However, in this context, Jodhpur is the correct answer.
